definitions.text: the posterior part of the body of a vertebrate especially when elongated and extending beyond the trunk or main part of the body
the time of the last part of something
examples: the fag end of this crisis-ridden century

definitions.text: any projection that resembles the tail of an animal
the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: a spy employed to follow someone and report their movements
(usually plural) the reverse side of a coin that does not bear the representation of a person's head
the rear part of an aircraft
the rear part of a ship
go after with the intent to catch
examples: The policeman chased the mugger down the alley

definitions.text: remove or shorten the tail of an animal
remove the stalk of fruits or berries
